recline.translation[0].definitions[0].de: to lie or lean back in a relaxed way
recline.translation[0].definitions[0].ex: I spent Sunday reclining in a deckchair.
A solitary figure was reclining on the grass.
recline.translation[0].definitions[1].de: if you recline a seat, or if it reclines, you lower the back of the seat so that you can lean back in it
